name: QtDesignStudio
author: Qt
description: Warns about restrictions for QDS support

loggingCategories.name: FunctionsNotSupportedInQmlUi
loggingCategories.description: Warn about unsupported function calls in ui.qml files

loggingCategories.name: ReferenceToParentItemNotSupportedByVisualDesigner
loggingCategories.description: Warn about references to the parent of a root Component in ui.qml files

loggingCategories.name: ImperativeCodeNotEditableInVisualDesigner
loggingCategories.description: Warn about unwanted assignments ui.qml files

loggingCategories.name: UnsupportedTypeInQmlUi
loggingCategories.description: Warn about unsupported types in ui.qml files

loggingCategories.name: InvalidIdeInVisualDesigner
loggingCategories.description: Warn about ambiguous id names in ui.qml files

loggingCategories.name: UnsupportedRootTypeInQmlUi
loggingCategories.description: Warn about unsupported root types in ui.qml files
